settings.app-store-preferences.title: App Store Preferences
change-name.description: This appears one the home screen, and will be your device name too.
change-password.description: This is the password you use to unlock your Umbrel.
change-password.callout: If you lose your password, you won’t be able to log in to your Umbrel for eternity.
restart.restarting-message: Please do not refresh this page or turn off your Umbrel while it is restarting.
restart.confirm.title: Are you sure you want to restart your Umbrel?
shut-down.shutting-down-message: Please do not refresh this page or turn off your Umbrel while it is shutting down.
shut-down.confirm.title: Are you sure you want to shut down your Umbrel?
tor.enable.title: Enable Tor for remote access
tor.enable.description: This may restart your Umbrel and it can take a few minutes.
migration-assistant.description: Transfer your umbrelOS from a Pi-based device to Umbrel Home in 3 steps
migration-assistant.prep.callout: The data in Umbrel Home, if any, will be permanently deleted
migration-assistant.prep.connect-disk-to: Connect its SSD to Umbrel Home via USB
migration-assistant.ready.title: You’re all set to migrate!
migration-assistant.ready.description: umbrelOS is ready to be migrated to Umbrel Home
migration-assistant.ready.hint-use-same-: Remember to use Raspberry Pi Umbrel’s password to unlock your Umbrel Home
migration-assistant.ready.hint-keep-pi-o: Keep your Raspberry Pi off after the update
This helps prevent issues with apps such as Lightning Node
migration-assistant.failed.ssd-not-detec: Make sure you’ve connected Raspberry Pi Umbrel’s SSD to your Umbrel Home
migration-assistant.failed.incorrect-ssd: Make sure you’ve connected Raspberry Pi Umbrel’s SSD to your Umbrel Home

logout.confirm.title: Are you sure you want to log out?
app-only-over-tor: {{app}} can only be used over Tor. Please access your Umbrel in a Tor browser on your remote access URL (Settings > Account > Remote access) to open this app.

migrate.callout: Do not turn off your device until the migration is complete

onboarding.create-account.subtitle: Your account info is stored only on your Umbrel. Make sure to back up your password safely as there is no way to reset it.
onboarding.account-created.by-clicking-b: By clicking {{button}} below, we take it that you agree to our privacy policy and term of service.
